column2: Damages slashed to $34.6 mln in Boston Scientific mesh trial Oct 3 A jury award of $73.4 million to a woman who said she was injured by a Boston Scientific Corp  transvaginal mesh device has been cut to $34.6 million
column3: thanks to a Texas law that caps how much companies must pay in punitive damages.
